Waste generation and significant waste-related impacts
column13: Our partnership with Substation33 and PowerWells is to repurpose electronic waste from offices and homes to reduce waste and tackle energy poverty. In FY23, we supported their electronic recycling programs to connect 15 small-scale solar systems built from e-waste. The solar systems built have impacted the community significantly by helping to power 23 families for five-plus years.
column20: Electronic Waste Repurposing, Community Impact, Solar Power Systems

column6: Management of significant waste-related impacts
column13: Our approach to electronic waste involves repairing equipment less than halfway through its intended lifecycle to maximise its utility. Any obsolete equipment is responsibly disposed of through vendor recycling programs or social enterprise initiatives.
column20: Electronic Waste Management, Equipment Repair, Recycling Initiatives

column6: Waste generated

column7: Reflective of our efforts to promote awareness and drive change, our total waste diversion from landfills was maintained at 31 per cent during the year through TechnologyOne's recycling programs.

column13: Externally, we concentrate on building robust talent pipelines through proactive engagement with potential future hires, partnering with universities for our graduate and intern programs and maintaining our alum relationships. During the year, 19 talented individuals joined us as part of our graduate and intern intake with considerable training, coaching and development invested.
column20: Talent Pipeline Building, University Partnerships, Graduate Programs

column6: New employee hires and employee turnover
column13: Our onboarding program is industry-leading. All new team members across our global operations participate in an immersive 'O-Week' program where they meet our Executive and senior leaders and learn about our history, vision and mission, company values, business structure and how we deliver a compelling customer experience.
column20: Onboarding Program, New Hire Engagement, Company Induction

column6: New employee hires and employee turnover
column13: Our twice-yearly employee Net Promoter Score (eNPS) survey is one of the principal tools used to measure employee engagement and commitment to TechnologyOne and gather team members' views. FY23 result was an increase in prior years and a continued step towards our FY26 target of eNPS +50.
column20: Employee Engagement Survey, Feedback Collection, Goal Achievement

Implement initiatives aimed at further embedding our culture and the TechnologyOne Way. Continue to benchmark and assess our employee benefits and practices.

Programs for upgrading employee skills and transition assistance programs
column13: The Digital Access program aims to increase the number of Learning for Life families who are digitally included by ensuring students have access to technology-enriched home learning environments. It provides access to a device, affordable internet (including access to free data, technical support, and information on how to make the most out of the technology they have.
column20: Digital Access Program, Learning Support, Technology Inclusion

column6: Programs for upgrading employee skills and transition assistance programs
column13: In July, we facilitated our second Leadership Community Summit, bringing together over 180 leaders across our global operations to share our company purpose and engage in strategic initiatives. Additional avenues to support our current and emerging leaders include mentoring, coaching and 360-degree feedback for continual professional development.
column20: Leadership Summit, Professional Development, Talent Support

column6: Programs for upgrading employee skills and transition assistance programs
column8: 70:20:10 Blended model for learning and development
column13: We work towards a 70:20:10 blended model for learning and development, focusing on experience, exposure, and formal training. Our Learning Team supports team member development by creating in-house learning modules and monitoring compliance to ensure all our team members are equipped to do their roles.
